EnumParameter.Name: mode
EnumParameter.Description: Noise Estimation Mode. Class 1 parameter. Default=2

FixedPointParameter.Name: cross_comp
FixedPointParameter.Description: Gain Compensation between primary and secondary microphones. Class 1 parameter. Default=4096

FixedPointParameter.Name: smooth
FixedPointParameter.Description: Smoothing factor of noise power spectral density estimated by DNR. Class 1 parameter. Default=29491

FixedPointParameter.Name: scale_ple
FixedPointParameter.Description: Scaling of the DNR noise estimation. Class 2 parameter. Default=16384

FixedPointParameter.Name: min_stat_scale
FixedPointParameter.Description: Scaling of the single channel noise estimation. Class 2 parameter. Default=16384

FixedPointParameter.Name: diff_smooth
FixedPointParameter.Description: Smoothing of difference. Class 2 parameter. Default=29491

FixedPointParameter.Name: threshold
FixedPointParameter.Description: Threshold for PLE estimation. Class 2 parameter. Default=4096

FixedPointParameter.Name: ph1
FixedPointParameter.Description: Smoothing of the speech presence probability estimate. Class 2 parameter. Default=29491

FixedPointParameter.Name: np
FixedPointParameter.Description: Smoothing of the spectral noise power estimate. Class 2 parameter. Default=26214

FixedPointParameter.Name: nn
FixedPointParameter.Description: Smoothing of the periodograms. Class 2 parameter. Default=24576

FixedPointParameter.Name: coh_threshold
FixedPointParameter.Description: Coherence based threshold for noise estimation (band x). Class 1 parameter. Default=26214
